thread.section_title: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia | eglobaldigitalcameras.com.au
thread.title: Justin
thread.title_full: eGlobal Digital Cameras Australia reviewed by Justin

author: Justin
title: Justin
text: Bought two items on this site about 2 months apart, a pair of headphones (Sony MDR 1A)and a smart phone (OnePlus 3T) they were both at an excellent price even with priority express shipping with insurance added on and I received them both within 3 days from Hong Kong to NSW Australia in excellent condition they even included the necessary Australian power plug adaptor for the phones charger which was really handy and thoughtful, before I bought the phone they answered all my questions quickly and with plenty of info, overall a flawless experience definitely buying from them in the future
